Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>


* Zyber looked at Rowdy then at Striker as he responded to Rowdy's question, she hated to see two races fight like this when there was no real cause.
She sighed as she took the bowl from Striker and set it down beside her, she couldn't stop them if they decided to battle each other either.
Zyber decided that even if they were to battle she wouldn't intervene, she would only help the looser recover from his wounds.
She looked up at Rowdy and then Striker, a sad look in her optics then she picked up the bowl and began to walk outside. If they were to fight then she wanted nothing to do with it, besides the fact that seeing such bots battle just because they were different seemed stupid to her.*

____________________________________________

* Iron Raptor peered through the bushes beside Prowl, she twitched her tail in thought of his question to join in on the battle.
She decided that since there was no reason to join she wouldn't, it would only result in wounds that could have been prevented.
Besides, it was a battle between the Alliance and this new ship, since it seemed to belong to no Maximal force what was the reason to intervene.
If it was an Predacon or enemy ship then why bother, perhaps they would cancle each other out?
Iron Raptor would have shaken her head but it would have rustled the bushes and given away their position, she gave Prowl a look the said it all. But that same look also said that he could jump in if he wanted to, it was his spark...afterall. But the records would then show that she advised against such an action, fighting just to fight could get an unwise bot killed!*
